LanguageData.BAW_Hoshino.label: Eye of Horus
LanguageData.BAW_Hoshino.description: Hoshino's beloved shotgun, sporting a simple design.\n\nWhile she may be lazy at heart, Hoshino does not slack off when it comes to maintaining her weapon.
LanguageData.BAW_Hoshino.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Hoshino.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Hoshino.label: Bullet of Eye of Horus
LanguageData.BAW_Shiroko.label: WHITE FANG 465
LanguageData.BAW_Shiroko.description: Shiroko's cherished assault rifle.\n\nThanks to careful maintenance, it's always ready to use whenever the need arises.
LanguageData.BAW_Shiroko.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Shiroko.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Shiroko.label: Bullet of WHITE FANG 465
LanguageData.BAW_Serika.label: Sincerity
LanguageData.BAW_Serika.description: An assault rifle Serika carries to her part-time job.\n\nIt is always carefully maintained, thanks to Serika's meticulousness and sincerity.

LanguageData.BAW_Serika.tools.1.label: barrel

LanguageData.BAW_Nonomi.label: Little Machine Gun V
LanguageData.BAW_Nonomi.description: Machine gun used by Nonomi.\n\nDespite the "Little" moniker, it's actually quite big.
